text: The University of Texas at San Antonio, also known as UTSA (especially when talking about sports), is a public university in San Antonio, Texas, United States. It has about 28,000 students enrolled and it was founded in 1969. UTSA's sports teams, known as Roadrunners, joined the American Athletic Conference in 2023. ==References== * ==Other websites== *The University of Texas at San Antonio *UTSA Roadrunners Category:University of Texas UTSA Category:San Antonio, Texas Category:1969 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Texas
title: University of Texas at San Antonio
